meanings.definition: A type of single-celled organism that belongs to the group of ciliates.
meanings.sent1: Under the microscope, paramecia can be seen moving gracefully.
meanings.sent2: Scientists study paramecia to learn more about single-celled organisms.
meanings.sent3: The paramecia threw a tiny party in the petri dish.
meanings.sent4: In the world of microorganisms, paramecia are like tiny dancers.
meanings.sent5: The classroom was amazed by the diverse shapes of paramecia.
